name: Koala Tree
text: Send this card to the GY if you control a non-"Koala" monster. When this card is activated: Add 1 "Koala" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can Fusion Summon 1 "Koala" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck by shuffling the Fusion Materials listed on it into the Deck, from among the monsters in your GY and/or your face-up banished cards. If a "Koala" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this face-up card you control instead. You can only use each effect of "Koala Tree" once per turn.
